short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to add items to your TheWishler.com wish list directly from your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow you to add items directly to your TheWishler.com wish list while you browse! Simply click the icon and hit add, no need to leave TheWishler.com open while you browse the internet.
